mapper.sql: SELECT co.commodity_id, commodity_name, master_map, ch.info AS check_info, ch.state AS check_state FROM commodity AS co JOIN (SELECT cc.info AS info, cc.state AS state, ch1.commodity_id AS commodity_id FROM check_info AS ch1 JOIN check_code AS cc ON ch1.check_code = cc.check_code) AS ch ON co.commodity_id = ch.commodity_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commodity (commodity_id, store_id, category_id, commodity_name, shipping, master_map, commodity_describe, address, publish_date) VALUES (#{commodity.commodityId}, #{commodity.storeId}, #{commodity.categoryId}, #{commodity.commodityName}, #{commodity.shipping}, #{commodity.masterMap}, #{commodity.commodityDescribe}, #{commodity.address}, CURDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT commodity.commodity_id, commodity.commodity_name, commodity.master_map, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), check_info.check_date) AS inSellDay FROM commodity JOIN check_info ON commodity.commodity_id = check_info.commodity_id WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND status_code = 1

SELECT commodity_id, commodity_name, ca.category_name AS category_name, master_map, commodity_describe, address, publish_date FROM commodity AS co JOIN category AS ca ON co.category_id = ca.category_id WHERE co.commodity_id = #{commodityId} AND co.is_publish = 1;
SELECT commodity_id, commodity_name, master_map, down_date, down_commotion FROM commodity WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND is_publish = -1

SELECT cl.*, cc.info AS check_info, cc.state AS check_state FROM (SELECT co.commodity_id, co.commodity_name, co.master_map, ci.apply_date, ci.check_code, ci.check_date, ci.remark, ci.staff_id FROM (SELECT commodity_id, commodity_name, master_map FROM commodity WHERE commodity_id = #{commodityId} AND store_id = #{storeId}) AS co JOIN check_info ci ON co.commodity_id = ci.commodity_id) AS cl JOIN check_code cc ON cl.check_code = cc.check_code;

SELECT commodity_id, store_id, master_map, commodity_name FROM commodity WHERE commodity_id IN (SELECT commodity_id FROM check_info WHERE check_code IN (SELECT check_code FROM check_code WHERE check_code.state = #{state}))
